description: Creamy and comforting curried sausages simmered with sweet onion, beans and peas. Try this easy one-pot recipe for a cosy dinner in.
keywords: Curried sausage,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Rice
name: One-Pot Curried Beef Sausages With Beans & Peas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook sausages, turning, for 10 minutes or until browned and cooked through. Remove from pan and thickly slice diagonally.

Cook onion in same pan over medium heat, stirring, for 3 minutes or until softened. Add recipe base, milk and sausage, then bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, covered, for 5 minutes or until slightly thickened. Add beans and peas, then cook, covered, for 2 minutes or until beans are just tender.
Meanwhile, heat rice according to packet instructions.
